item.title: Asmodeus's Dread Authority
item.fluff: Asmodeus invests you with the authority he uses to rule the Nine Hells

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); The boon's level +5 vs. Will
Hit: The target is subject to your dread authority (save ends).
While subject to your authority, you can slide the target 1 square at the start of each of its turns.
Level 13: Slide 2 squares.
Level 23: Slide 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature subject to your dread authority, or one devil); The target chooses to either fall prone or take 5 fire damage. A devil does not benefit from resists against this damage.
Level 13: 10 fire damage.
Level 23: Ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends).

item.title: Avandra's Blessing of Confidence
item.fluff: Individuals blessed by Avandra gain an indomitable confidence in their own capabilities, allowing them to call upon teir inner stregnth to augment themselves

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► You gain resist 5 all against opportunity attacks.
Level 13: Resist 10 all.
Level 23: Resist 15 all.
► You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that render you dazed, dominated, immobilized, restrained, slowed, or stunned.

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Escape
item.fluff: Gambits that rely on luck draw boons from Avandra, and individuals blessed by her are impossible to corner

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You started your turn adjacent to two or more enemies
Effect: You shift 2 squares.
Level 13: Shift 3 squares.
Level 23: Shift 4 squares.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You teleport up to 2 squares.
Level 13: Up to 4 squares.
Level 23: Up to 6 squares.

item.title: Avandra's Boon of Storms
item.fluff: Like an ocean storm, change is both inevitable and rarely controllable, but to those who embrace change rather than fight it, Avandra occasionally grants the power to influence events

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks.
Level 11: +3 item bonus.
Level 21: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a skill check and don't like the result
Effect: You reroll the skill check and use the second result, even if it's lower.
Level 11: Use whichever result is higher.
Level 21: If the triggering skill check still fails, you regain the use of this power when you take a short rest.

item.title: Bahamut's Protective Ward
item.fluff: Bahamut grants his boon to heroes who shield the weak from the strong, and individuals who fight in Bahamut's name are beacons of hope and protection

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks.
Level 13: +2 item bonus.
Level 23: +3 item bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies provoke opportunity attacks from you if they make an attack that does not include you as a target.
Level 13: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.
Level 23: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with these attacks.

item.title: Bane's Battle Acument
item.fluff: The Iron General is the consummate warrior and those with his favor gain a measure of his tactical acumen

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you roll a natural 19 or 20 on a Weapon attack roll, one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free action.
Level 13: The ally shifts up to 2 squares.
Level 23: One ally within 5 squares of you can shift up to 2 quares as a free reaction, or two allies within 5 squares of you can each shift 1 square as a free reaction.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You roll initiative
Effect: Close burst 5 (each ally in the burst); You slide each target 1 square.
Level 13: Slide up to 2 squares.
Level 23: Slide up to 3 squares.

item.title: Corellon's Boon of Arcane Might
item.fluff: Corellon brought arcane magic to the world, and mortals who please him gain access to powers that otherwise take years of study to master

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain one 1st-level at-will attack power from an arcane class as an encounter power.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Choose a 1st-level encounter power from the same arcane class this boon's property granted you a power. You can use the chosen power once before the end of the encounter.
Level 8: A 3rd-level or lower encounter power.
Level 13: A 7th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 18: A 13th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 23: A 17th-level or lower encounter power.
Level 28: A 23rd-level or lower encounter power.

item.title: Erathis' Beacon
item.fluff: The first cities were carved from the wilderness in the name of Erathis and, with her boon, the same sense of teamwork allows you and your allies to overcome any obstacle

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use the aid another or aid defense action, you grant your ally a +4 bonus rather than +2.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value. The target also gains a +1 bonus to his or her next attack roll.
Level 13: The target regains an additional 1d6 hit points, and gains a +2 bonus.
Level 23: The target regains an additional 2d6 hit points, and gains a +3 bonus.

item.title: Gruumsh's Bloodthirsty Wrath
item.fluff: Destruction and carnage are the only things able to quell Gruumsh's appetite for chaos

block.name: Property
block.line: The first time in an encounter that you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain temporary hit points equal to this boon's level.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be bloodied, or become bloodied by the triggering attack.
Trigger: An attack hits you.
Effect: You make a melee basic attack against a random creature within your reach. If this attack hits, you can also spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

item.title: Ioun's Revelation
item.fluff: Ioun rewards study and the relentless pursuit of knowledge, and supporters who earn her favor gain the ability to master any task, no matter how daunting

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to all skill checks.
Level 13 or 18: +2 item bonus.
Level 23 or 28: +3 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 10 (you and each ally in the burst); Choose one skill.
Each target gains a +1 power bonus to skill checks with the chosen skill until the end of the encounter.
Level 8: +2 power bonus.
Level 13: +3 power bonus.
Level 18: +4 power bonus.
Level 23: +5 power bonus.
Level 28: +6 power bonus.

item.title: Kord's Mighty Strength
item.fluff: Kord lends his strength to followers who prove their mettle in battle against his enemies

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +5 item bonus to Strength checks to break objects.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You gain a item bonus to melee damage rolls until the end of the encounter. The bonus equals the bonus you gain to Athletics checks from this boon.

item.title: Lolth's Fickle Favor
item.fluff: The Demon Queen of Spiders is a fickle goddess, as likely to offer a gift as she is to bestow a curse

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 poison.
Level 13 or 18: Resist 10.
Level 23 or 28: Resist 15.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy bloodies you with an attack
Effect: Roll a d8.
On an odd number, you are dazed until the end of your next turn.
On an even number, you become invisible until the end of your next turn and you must teleport. You can teleport up to a number of squares equal to the die roll.

item.title: Melora's Storm Blessing
item.fluff: Individuals who please Melora gain the ability to walk upon the air, soaring over their enemies and obstacles paced before them with ease

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You are pushed, pulled, or slid
Effect: You can shift 1 square.
Level 23 or 28: Shift 2 squares.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You fly 5 squares.
Level 8: 6 squares.
Level 13: 7 squares.
Level 18: 8 squares.
Level 23: 9 squares.
Level 28: 10 squares.

item.title: Moradin's Blessing of Iron
item.fluff: Moradin grants teh strength of the mountain and the toughness of iron to followers who win his favor, augmenting both body and mind, instilling bravery and toughness in his chosen

block.name: Property
block.line: If an enemy pushes you, you can reduce the maximum distance you are pushed by 2.
If an enemy pulls you and that pull leaves you adjacent to that enemy, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an opportunity reaction.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You take damage
Effect: You reduce the damage you take by 5.
Level 8: By 10.
Level 13: By 15.
Level 18: By 20.
Level 23: By 25.
Level 28: By 30.

item.title: Nature's Fervor
item.fluff: Defeating monsterss that corrupt the natural world fills you with zeal, enabling you to carry on the righteous battle

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your second wind, you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. You gain an item bonus to this saving throw equal to this boon's bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You drop an enemy to 0 hit points
Effect: You gain your choice of either of the following two effects:
► You spend a healing to surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value + twice this boon's bonus.
► You regain an expended encounter attack power of this boon's level or lower.
If the triggering enemy was aberrant or undead, you gain both benefits.

item.title: Pelor's Sun Blessing
item.fluff: The undimmed light of Pelor shines from individuals who champion his cause, driving evil before them and bringing solace to companions fighting alongside them

block.name: Property
block.line: If you deal non-radiant damage to a target that has a vulnerability or other weakness to radiant damage, you deal additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier or your Wisdom modifier, whichever is higher.
Level 13 or 18: Equal to 2 + the higher ability modifier.
Level 23 or 28: Equal to 4 + the higher ability modifier.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You emit bright light in a 5-square radius, and dim light for a further 5 squares.
You can use the power again to stop emitting light.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, and gains a +1 item bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.
Level 8: +2 item bonus.
Level 13: Equal to his or her healing surge value + 1d6 additional hit points, and a +2 item bonus.
Level 18: Equal to his or her healing surge value + 1d6 additional hit points, and a +3 item bonus.
Level 23: Equal to his or her healing surge value + 2d6 additional hit points, and a +3 item bonus.
Level 28: Equal to his or her healing surge value + 2d6 additional hit points, and a +4 item bonus.

item.title: Sehanine's Mark of the Dark Moon
item.fluff: The priests of Sehanine speak of the dark moon, an invisible celestial object that casts protective shadows upon Sehanine's followers

block.name: Property
block.line: If a creature cannot see you, you take half damage from its attacks that hit you and no damage from its attacks that deal damage on a miss.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You take damage
Effect: You teleport 2 squares.
Level 8: You teleport 3 squares. If you have cover or concealment at the destination, you can make a Stealth check to hide as part of the teleportation.
Level 13: You teleport 4 squares, become invisible until the end of your next turn, and can make a Stealth check to hide as part of the teleportation.
Level 18: You teleport 6 squares, otherwise as level 13.
Level 23: You teleport 8 squares, otherwise as level 13.
Level 28: As level 23, but you can use this power as an immediate interrupt instead.

item.title: The Raven Queen's Shroud
item.fluff: The Reven Queen cloaks her champions in a shroud of darkness, a halo of divine magic that aids them in enforcing the dictates of fate

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Ranged 10 (one creature); The target gains the mark of the Raven Queen until the end of the encounter.
On your turn, you can reroll one the result of one damage die against the target. This reroll does not alter the damge for other targets if your attack targeted creatures other than the target.
Level 13 or 18: The result of two damage dice.
Level 23 or 28: The result of three damage dice.

If the target is undead and the rerolled result is 1 on a d4 or d6, or a 1 or 2 on another die, you can keep rerolling until the result of that die is higher than that. Your DM might allow you to apply this effect to other enemies of the Raven Queen.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You teleport to a space adjacent to the target bears the mark of the Raven Queen. You must have a general idea where the bearer of the mark is, but do not need line of sight or line of effect.
Level 8: You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 13: You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 18: You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 23: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.
Level 13: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +6 power bonus to damage rolls against the bearer of the mark until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Torog's Lamentation of the Shackled
item.fluff: Torog grants his boon to ardent disciples who embrace pain and bondage, and who hope to be released from their earthly restraints by pledging themselves body and soul to the King That Crawls

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Saving throws against effects that make you slowed, immobilized, or restrained

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You become slowed, immobilized or restrained
Effect:You teleport a number of squares equal to 1 + this boon's bonus, and are no longer slowed, immobilized or restrained.
